subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cole Hamels pitched eight strong innings, Tadahito Iguchi hit his first home run with Philadelphia and the Phillies beat Ted Lilly and the host Chicago Cubs, 4-1, last night for their fourth straight victory.
snippet: Cole Hamels pitched eight strong innings, Tadahito Iguchi hit his first home run with Philadelphia and the Phillies beat Ted Lilly and the host Chicago Cubs, 4-1, last night for their fourth straight victory.
